text: The Childhood of Maxim Gorky () is a 1938 Soviet movie directed by Mark Donskoy.Детство ГорькогоДетское кино It stars Aleksei Lyarsky, Varvara Massalitinova, and Mikhail Troyanovsky. ==Actors== * Aleksei Lyarsky: Aleksei Peshkov (later, Maxim Gorky) (as Alyosha Lyarsky) * Varvara Massalitinova: Akulina Ivanva Kashirin, grandmother * Mikhail Troyanovsky: Vasili Vasilyevich Kashirin, grandfather * Elizaveta Alekseeva: Varvara Kashirina Peshkova, mother (as E. Alekseeva) * Vyacheslav Novikov: Uncle Yakov Kashirin (as V. Novikov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian biographical movies Category:1938 movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:Movies set in the 1870s Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies directed by Mark Donskoy
title: The Childhood of Maxim Gorky
